attributes.action: stop the potential closure of Sacred Heart R.C. V.A. Primary School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sacred Heart has been included in a small cluster of schools in the Gateshead area for potential closure. We are an R.C. V.A. school which has been at the centre of the parish and community for the last century. Our mission statement is 'When we welcome the child, we welcome the family' and we are determined to be here for our children and parents for another century!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
